                "Connect in the same way, passing in the extra options "
              ],
              [
                "ssl-ca",
                [
                  [
                    "c"
                  ]
                ]
              ],
              [
                ", "
              ],
              [
                "ssl-cert",
                [
                  [
                    "c"
                  ]
                ]
              ],
              [
                ", and "
              ],
              [
                "ssl-key",
                [
                  [
                    "c"
                  ]
                ]
              ],
              [
                ", using the generated client key. For example, assuming "
              ],
              [
                "cd /home/ubuntu/mysqlcerts",
                [
                  [
                    "c"
                  ]
                ]
              ],
              [
                ":"

                "openssl req -newkey rsa:2048 -days 3600 -nodes -keyout server-key.pem -out server-req.pem\nopenssl rsa -in server-key.pem -out server-key.pem\n\nopenssl x509 -req -in server-req.pem -days 3600 -CA ca.pem -CAkey ca-key.pem -set_serial 01 -out server-cert.pem"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "type": "code",
          "version": 1
